availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of Robert Ewing. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2, p. 16B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 86A.
